data.name: High Smileson
data.detailed_description:
Tired of challenge, rushing, and competition?
We don't have it!!! The cute little snail will take you to a world of relaxation, positive vibes, and only good news ^_^.
Read inspiring little stories about High Smileson and find his friend - High Snailson in every picture.
This game is about finding yourself, your inner peace, and enjoying small simple moments in life.

A world created from the works of the popular Internet artist High Smileson. This is a short but relaxing and fun click-read-find game.
- Find all the mini-stories on the world map, along the way finding snails in each picture.
- Cartoon graphics
- Great relaxing music
- A hero who will teach you not to worry about the difficulties of life
- Easy gameplay!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Celeron
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Have 1 cartoon picture with sex scene without anatomic details. Also include drug images and processes of drug-using
